overview_of_class: A basic introduction to the strategic marketing communications process that includes consumer insight and research, market segmentation, brand positioning, communications messages and media decisions. Overviews the tactical areas of marketing communications including branding, advertising, digital media and corporate communications. Prerequisite: sophomore status (this course cannot be counted toward the IMC Certificate Program).
name: Introduction to Integrated Marketing Communications
title: JOUR IMC 300-0-20 Introduction to Integrated Marketing Communications
